sentences.en: Although things are changing the medical establishment is still overwhelmingly male.
sentences.cn: 虽然世易时移，但医学界依然是男性的天下。

sentences.en: Gatsby was overwhelmingly aware of the youth and mystery that wealth imprisons and preserves.
sentences.cn: 盖茨比深切地体会到财富怎样禁锢和保存着青春与神秘.

sentences.en: Had not the Peers too overwhelmingly expressed their preference for no change?
sentences.cn: 绝大多数上院议员不是也表示不喜欢换人 吗 ?

sentences.en: Historically, the bank note is the overwhelmingly dominant form of warehouse receipt.
sentences.cn: 在历史上, 银行券是占绝对统治地位的票据形式.

sentences.en: Mason had been overwhelmingly elected to the judgeship which he had so craved.
sentences.cn: 梅森以压倒的票数当选他梦寐以求的法官.

sentences.en: None of the other ideas seems overwhelmingly be convincing.
sentences.cn: 看来其它观点不具有压倒一切的说服力.

sentences.en: Public reaction was immediate and overwhelmingly favourable.
sentences.cn: 公众反应迅速,而且普遍持赞成态度.

sentences.en: The House of Commons has overwhelmingly rejected calls to bring back the death penalty for murder.
sentences.cn: 下议院以压倒性的多数驳回了对谋杀罪恢复死刑判决的呼吁。

sentences.en: The House of Commons has overwhelmingly rejected demands to bring back the death penalty for murder.
sentences.cn: 下议院以绝对多数否决了对谋杀罪恢复死刑的要求。

sentences.en: The inhabitants have voted overwhelmingly to restore the city's original name of Chemnitz.
sentences.cn: 居民以压倒多数票同意恢复该市原来的名字“开姆尼茨”。

sentences.en: The local economy is overwhelmingly dependent on oil and gas extraction.
sentences.cn: 当地经济过于依赖石油和天然气的开采。

sentences.en: The news from overseas is overwhelmingly negative.
sentences.cn: 来自海外的消息特别不容乐观。

sentences.en: The Senate has overwhelmingly approved a hike in minimum wage.
sentences.cn: 参议院以压倒性优势赞成增加最低工作额度.

sentences.en: They voted overwhelmingly against the proposal.
sentences.cn: 他们以压倒多数票否决了该提案.

sentences.en: Women of his own middle class found him overwhelmingly attractive.
sentences.cn: 同属中产阶级的女性觉得他的魅力令人难以抗拒。
